title: Sorcerer's Vendetta
description: Shot by poison, his mana stolen, the Sorcerer races against impending death to find his betrayer and drag him in sacrifice to the rival witch who helps him, for a price - the secret of immortality. His journey takes him to present day England to join in collusion with Rachel Floyd, art historian. Through twists and turns he finds a precious gift beyond revenge in the truth of his life---or death.
author: Sarah S. Ray
